Agents need a mechanism to transition tasks to done/review on completion. Found on Mule: TASK-002 and TASK-003 completed work but stayed in-progress.

title: Add daemon CLI commands (start/stop/status/restart)
description: Wire daemon core logic to CLI. Add src/cli/commands/daemon.ts with start/stop/status/restart subcommands. Commands should: start (fork daemon, write PID, exit), stop (read PID, SIGTERM, wait for exit), status (check PID file + process alive), restart (stop then start). Use existing src/daemon/index.ts exports. Add --port, --bind, --data-dir flags. Include help text + examples. Add unit tests for command parsing. Integration test: start → status → stop. Critical blocker: AOF cannot run autonomously without this.
